metadata.title: CVE-2017-14348 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: LibRaw before 0.18.4 has a heap-based Buffer Overflow in theprocessCanonCameraInfo function via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
